name: Another Platform Game
description:
Non commercial use

This is a platformer game made for a course dictated in the National Technological University in Argentina (UTN) as a practical work. Content
  • 1 playable level.
  • All the art from Sunny Land package in the Asset store of Unity (credits to Ansimuz, Visit his website: http://pixelgameart.org/web/)
  • GUI: Main menu, hints and level info.
  • Player only has one opportunity.
  • VFX. Lights.
  • SFX y music download from http://www.orangefreesounds.com.
